sentences.sContent: Janet became hysterical and began screaming.
sentences.sCn: 珍妮特歇斯底里起来，开始尖叫。

sentences.sContent: Everyone in the studio burst into hysterical laughter .
sentences.sCn: 演播室里的每个人都爆发出一阵狂笑。

synos.tran: 歇斯底里的；异常兴奋的

words.tran: 歇斯底里的；癔病的；亢奋的
癔病，歇斯底里；不正常的兴奋
癔病患者；歇斯底里患者
歇斯底里症的发作；发疯

trans.tranCn: 歇斯底里的；异常兴奋的
trans.tranOther: unable to control your behaviour or emotions because you are very upset, afraid, excited etc
